Description: MyHPCCCloudFormationTemplate.json: Launches instances for fast executing HPCC on AWS. Plus, it sets up and starts HPCC System.

SSHUserName.Description: The user name used to ssh into an instance

HPCCPlatform.Description: The version of the HPCC Platform to install.

KeyPair.Description: The EC2 Key Pair to allow SSH access to the instances.

EBSVolumesMaster.Description: Size in GBs of EBS Volume for Master(OPTIONAL)

EBSVolumesSlaves.Description: Size in GBs of EBS Volume for Slaves(OPTIONAL)

EBSVolumesRoxie.Description: Size in GBs of EBS Volume for Roxie(OPTIONAL)

InstallCassandra.Description: (Optional) YES or NO to install Cassandra

UserNameAndPassword.Description: (Optional) Enter like: username/password Used to log into ECL Watch and ECL IDE.

NumberOfSlaveInstances.Description: Number of Slave instances to be launched

NumberOfRoxieInstances.Description: Number of Roxie nodes in deployed HPCC System

NumberOfSlavesPerInstance.Description: Number of THOR slave nodes per slave instance

NumberOfChannelsPerSlave.Description: Number of channels (threads) per slave. ONLY ALLOWED WITH version 6 of the HPCC Platform.

MasterInstanceType.Description: HPCC Thor Master EC2 instance type

SlaveInstanceType.Description: HPCC Thor Slave EC2 instance type

AdminCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Used for ssh and port 8010. Must be a valid CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
AdminCIDR.Description: CIDR block used for ssh and port 8010.

ScriptsS3BucketFolder.Description: S3 bucket folder that contains the scripts that are executed in the UserData section.

Properties.GroupDescription: The following properities are the ports that an HPCC System needs

Fn::Join: echo SCRIPT: starting cassandra if installed
echo SCRIPT: completed cassandra if installed
echo SCRIPT: 'Signal stack that setup of HPCC System is complete.'
echo SCRIPT: 'Done signaling stack that setup of HPCC System has completed.'
